reviewText: Clerks (The Snowball Edition) / Clerks II / Chasing Amy(The Criterion Collection) (3 Pack) If you ever wanted to see someone VOMIT WITH RAGE this is the pack to get. Oh and if you like witty dialogue, thought provoking scenes, and hilarity, this is the way to go.
I hope Kevin Smith keeps putting out movies like these. He's the modern John Hughes. I also liked him in Live Free or Die Hard. I recieved it fast and in great shape.
